name.en: The Twin Dragons of the Heavens
name.ja: <ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>上<rt>じょう</rt></ruby><ruby>之<rt>の</rt></ruby><ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>輪<rt>りん</rt></ruby><ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Noble and majestic lights that pervade the heavens and earth throughout all eternity. They move based on the logic of the divine, calmly wielding majesty and authority.
text.ja: 万世に天地廻る気高き光。威を以て平かにし、神の理をも動かさん。

ja.set_name: Galaxy Cup 2024 Area Representative Match participation card
